name: Zombies Love Bread
description:
Zombies Love Bread - Fact!!

Since they love bread that much they seem to eat it if it's LAUNCHED at them.
Even though it turns them to dust.

Use your tasty Bread Launcher to protect your assigned area from the sudden influx of zombies...

Good Luck Random Person...

Zombies Love Bread was made in under 48 Hours for the32nd Ludlum Dare compotition. Hence why I've put a name your price on the game.

Have fun playing and don't forget to follow me over on the following.

Twitter: twitter.com/mrlparker.

Website: https://mrlparker.com

Have Fun Everyone!
